text: Yes. It's only effective after you've kicked the bucket.

text: I'll bounce you off the wall, son.

text: So unlike you... who seems to be completely comfortable just standing around like some fucking pussy... I decided to do something about it.

text: What is everybody doing standing around here?

text: The rate of infection for this patient is increasing every second you keep him open, not to mention the thousands of dollars you're wasting standing here doing nothing.
